name: Pairroxz Technologies
tagline: A Place Where Code means Creativity
description:
Pairroxz has marked its existence in market since 2011. We are engaged in development of some of the finest and feature rich apps in Android & iOS. This is not the only we do, we work more as a creative agency where we serve Full Marketing and Communication, User Experience(UX) / User Interface(UI) Research, Strategy & Design, Enterprise Website, Shape your ideas in reality, Wire framing, Front End Development and Backend Development.
“Our focus is to build a platform to execute the BRANDING STRATEGY”. We believe in creating innovations through technology and our perspective is what makes us different from others. We are big thinkers with a passion for creating beautifully crafted digital experiences specially integrated in covering user experience design, strategy, and creative, technology, media, and analytics, mobile, branded content and social media services.
